name: Crazy Running Cow - LD47
description:
Entry for LUDUM DARE 47

Please download game for Windows for best experience !

See the page in ldjam.com

CONTROLS :

Left | Right Arrow Keys

MECHANICS :

Survive the longest to get an higher score.

Checkpoints / Bonus / Perfect laps give points

High velocity collision / Bomb damage you

Taking damage make you panic (go faster)

Reduce panic by making perfect laps and taking bonus

Milk is bonus, bombs goes boom

Enjoy your time
